books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.overview: A novel set in the Roaring Twenties.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.overview: A novel that explores themes of racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

books.author: George Orwell
books.overview: A dystopian novel that explores the dangers of totalitarianism and extreme political ideology through the eyes of Winston Smith.

books.title: The Power of Habits
books.author: Charles Duhigg
books.overview: This book explains how habits are formed and how they can be changed. It shows how small habits can make a big difference in personal and professional life.

books.title: The Power of Habits
books.author: Charles Duhigg
books.overview: This book explains how habits are formed and how they can be changed. It shows how small habits can make a big difference in personal and professional life.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.overview: Atomic Habits focuses on building good habits and breaking bad ones through small, consistent changes. It is practical and easy to understand.

books.title: Deep Work
books.author: Cal Newport
books.overview: Deep Work emphasizes the importance of focused, distraction-free work for productivity and success in a world full of distractions.
